ygData.subject: Re: Int items (some spoiler info)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I had the funniest experience with these things. Most people did not know about cubert (neither did I) and the most common way to get them was camp the
ygData.messageBody:
Vince Seese wrote:
>
> From: Vince Seese <seese@...>
>
> Another MUCH missed int item that you can do at level 12 is the golden
> stud earring. This will be your first "lesson" in camping probably, but
> is a good one. Again, Graffe's page is the best, but the gist is you
> kill a mob in Qeynos (Cubert, named baby gelationous cube - about 80
> hp's), get an item, and trade it in for a +3 int earring. I did that a
> BUNCH of times, finally got my two, and thats no small int bonus for
> such a low level quest! And the best part is, they are like backup cash
> - if you are hitting a spell level, and need 30 plat fast...
>

I had the funniest experience with these things. Most people did not
know about cubert (neither did I) and the most common way to get them
was camp the gnoll high shamans in Lake Rathe. So, anyway, I never
camped mine. I bought mine for cheap somewhere in my teens (trade was
chaotic and uneven back then. Ahh the good days) and I sold them for
100pp one and for 175, I think, the other. People had no idea what they
are worth and how to get them.

--
Sergey
